body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting ShoeStyle Support. My name is Ronald Morgan. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the shipping options available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Marie. Could you provide me with your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. Additionally, could you confirm your phone number for us to update your account information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Marie. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Can you tell me the expected delivery time for my recent order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Marie. I'll check that for you. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It looks like your order is scheduled for delivery within five to seven business days.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great! That's sooner than I expected. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marie. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us again. Have a wonderful day!
